name: Viewing the newly added document on the dashboard
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Issue_Identity_attestations_65/photoIDCrossDevice:Viewing the newly added document on the dashboard
methodName: Viewing the newly added document on the dashboard

testSteps.description: Given the user sees the success message in the EUDI Wallet app
When the user presses on the CONTINUE button
Then the PhotoID should be presented in the dashboard screen

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to request and store photo ID attestations in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can identify myself using my EUDI Wallet in my travel user journey by presenting the requested attestations

title: Viewing the newly added document on the dashboard
